# ðŸš€ shimmytok v0.3.0

**Model Expansion** - Mistral, Qwen, and Gemma support

## Highlights

- ðŸ†• **Mistral** tokenizer support (SentencePiece)
- ðŸ†• **Qwen/Qwen2** tokenizer support (BPE)
- ðŸ†• **Gemma** tokenizer support (SentencePiece)
- ðŸ” **Model detection** - Query tokenizer type from metadata

## What's New

### New Models
| Model | Tokenizer Type |
|-------|----------------|
| Mistral | SentencePiece |
| Qwen | BPE |
| Qwen2 | BPE |
| Gemma | SentencePiece |

### New API
```rust
// Query the model/tokenizer type
tokenizer.model_type() -> &str  // Returns "llama", "gpt2", "mistral", etc.
```

### Supported Model Families
- LLaMA / Llama-2 / Llama-3
- Mistral âœ¨ NEW
- Phi-3
- Qwen / Qwen2 âœ¨ NEW
- Gemma âœ¨ NEW
- GPT-2 / GPT-3

## Installation

```toml
[dependencies]
shimmytok = "0.3"
```
